(Bat Probes are bigger than a hawk. And if you're shooting at 
PErceptor, the bot is male)

::Bat probes::

Bat probes separeated at severeal diferent's directions as soon as 
their ciruits  detected the shot, avoiding it.

::Perceptor::

Perceptor heard the missile and before its arrived, he quickly 
transformed to beast mode and, more quickly made a deep tunnel at 
underground.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: How big are the bat probes because I'm picturing little 
typical sized 
> bats and if they're bigger and should be doing more damage I need 
to know.
> 
> ::SkarBlaise::
>     He's knocked backwards again and trips over himself landing 
with a 
> resounding thud.  He sits up and grunts getting quite annoyed with 
these 
> pesky probes.  He fires another two missiles at the bot standing 
there.  He 
> didn't know her and didn't care he just wanted to hurt something.  
With his 
> laser canon he took aim and fired at three of the probes.  He 
shouts "You are 
> strong for one who is so small."
